*Avast Internet Security 6.0.934 

*License - Valid till 12/3/2011 

i know very short but thats the best working license i could get :(  

FOLLOW THESE - 

1)As Soon as u install -

*Disable Internet 
*Restart  if prompted 
*Go to settings > updates > set program update to manual!!
*Go to subscription and insert the license 

2)New Features In Avast 6.0934 & what you have to do - 

* .::NEW::. Avast gadget - 
    
Do not Click the Update button indicated above ^^ It updates both program and defenitions!






*If After Installing If u experience network problems when connecting to the internet Just go settings > Troubleshooting > redirect settings and clear all the Http ports - 

.::READ::.
If there are any problems with the license just disable internet and insert another one from the license folder.
